```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)

penguins <- read_csv("data/penguins_lter.csv")
penguins <- penguins %>%
  clean_names()
```

```{r, warning= FALSE}
ggplot(penguins, aes(island, culmen_length_mm, fill = island))+
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(
    title= "The Culmen length by the penguin islands",
    x = "Island",
    y = "Culmen_length_mm"
  )

```
